variables.name: NAME_ADDR_EMAIL_PATTERN
variables.comment:
* Regex pattern for names and email addresses. *
    *
  • mailbox = {@code name-addr}
    • *
  • name-addr = {@code [display-name] angle-addr}
    • *
  • angle-addr = {@code [CFWS] "<" addr-spec ">" [CFWS]}
    • *
* @hide
